headline: Good Works Team Nominees: Allstate and NACDA salute spring student-athletes making a difference
summary: NORTHBROOK, Ill., April 08, 2025--Allstate and the National Association of Collegiate Directors of Athletics (NACDA) today announced 207 student-athlete nominees for the inaugural Allstate NACDA Good Works Team (Spring), celebrating their leadership beyond sports. This year, the program expanded to honor both male and female student-athletes from all sports and divisions for their commitment to community service, academic excellence and athletics achievement.
